kw.name: Open Browser And Prepare Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//button[contains(text(),'Souhlas') or contains(text(),'Rozumím')]' not visible after 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//button[contains(text(),'Souhlas') or contains(text(),'Rozumím')]' not visible after 5 seconds.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Click Button
kw.msg: Button with locator 'xpath=//button[contains(text(),'Souhlas') or contains(text(),'Rozumím')]' not found.
kw.status: Button with locator 'xpath=//button[contains(text(),'Souhlas') or contains(text(),'Rozumím')]' not found.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.arg: var xp = document.evaluate("//button[contains(text(), 'Souhlas') or contains(text(), 'Rozumím')]", document, null, XPathResult.ORDERED_NODE_SNAPSHOT_TYPE, null);
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
Otevře prohlížeč, načte URL a odstraní banner cookies, pokud je přítomen

test.name: Title Should Be Correct

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Služby - Oficiální stránky města Dubňany'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

test.doc: Ověří, že se titul stránky shoduje s očekávaným

test.name: Menu Contains Services Link

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.doc: Ověří, že v hlavním menu je odkaz na Služby

test.name: Service Link Is Clickable

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Go Back
kw.doc: Simulates the user clicking the back button on their browser.

test.doc: Zkontroluje, že odkaz na "Městská knihovna" funguje

test.name: Contact Section Is Present

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.doc: Ověří, že je na stránce sekce Kontakt a obsahuje e-mail
